channel.title: Server help
channel.description:
How do I change a clients background? How do I change home place and where you log in? How do I move shop keepers? How do I change the title of the client?
I really need my help. i am helping my bro fix his old server but I don't know how to do these stuff and he's not home.

item.title: Server help
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

Okay, i’ll make this easier. Here is a background image just for you. In .png format.

I want you to place that image inside your Sprites folder. Once you have it in there go to Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java and search for:

Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage

Whatever it has entered there change to the directory of your sprites folder. So if the background image is called ‘Background’ then it you would put /Files/Sprites/Background.png in between the brackets.

Read full topic

item.title: Server help
item.dc:creator: @igli igli
item.description:
@igli wrote:

[quote=“Phaze One, post:9, topic:336079”]Just insert the a new picture and set the directory for it. For example mine says:

Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage("./Files/Sprites/Background_image.png");

So if I use that code and replace it with mine, will it change the background?

P.S.
I won’t use yours since you didn’t give me permission.

Read full topic

item.title: Server help
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

Just insert the a new picture and set the directory for it. For example mine says:

Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage("./Files/Sprites/Background_image.png");

Read full topic

item.title: Server help
item.dc:creator: @igli igli
item.description:
@igli wrote:

Oh okay.

There’s one more thing. I went to the Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java file to try to find where my client background is and it said its in the sprites and its called infinity. I went to the sprites and could not find it. I looked in every where. Any suggestions on what I should do to change the background?

Read full topic

item.title: Server help
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

Unfortunately you can’t. All of your NPC’s locations are in autospawn.cfg

Read full topic

item.description:
@igli wrote:

We don’t like servers like that. We like servers toward delta.

But is there anyway I can change the shops location without going in the autospawn file?

Read full topic

item.title: Server help
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

[quote=“igli, post:1, topic:336079”]How do I change a clients background?
How do I change the title of the client?[/quote]
In your client folder

For the background go to your sprites folder and look for it

for the title i think client.java or applet_sub_1.java

[quote=“igli, post:1, topic:336079”]How do I change home place and where you log in?
How do I move shop keepers?[/quote]
In your server folde

Home place in client.java look for your xxxx coord of your first login
to find it make a new account when you log in and then do ::mypos or ::coords

shopkeepers - autospawn.cfg

Read full topic

item.title: Server help
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

  1. find the existing background in the client folders and make your background the same name as it and replace it (this question belongs in client help not server help)

  2. find the existing home coords and search them in clickingmost.java

  3. autospawn.cfg

4.frame_sub1.java

Read full topic
